metadata.Title: CVE-2014-9939 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - negligible.
metadata.Description:
ihex.c in GNU Binutils before 2.26 contains a stack buffer overflow when printing bad bytes in Intel Hex objects.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9939` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

gdb - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdb-minimal - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdb-multiarch - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdb-source - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdb64 - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdbserver - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
No subscription required

notes.Note: sbeattie> issue is trapped by fortify source

criterions.comment: binutils package in trusty/esm is affected and needs fixing.
gdb package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3').
